DocAttribute.Name: Tag
DocAttribute.Documentation: The tag (or label) identifier at the particular instance of a product, e.g. the serial number, or the position number. It is the identifier at the occurrence level.

DocAttribute.Name: FillsVoids
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the _IfcRelFillsElement_ Relationship that puts the element as a filling into the opening created within another element.

DocAttribute.Name: ConnectedTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the element connection relationship. The relationship then refers to the other element to which this element is connected to.

DocAttribute.Name: IsInterferedByElements
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Reference to the interference relationship to indicate the element that is interfered. The relationship, if provided, indicates that this element has an interference with one or many other elements. > NOTE  There is no indication of precedence between _IsInterferedByElements_ and _InterferesElements_.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE New inverse relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: InterferesElements
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Reference to the interference relationship to indicate the element that interferes. The relationship, if provided, indicates that this element has an interference with one or many other elements. > NOTE  There is no indication of precedence between _IsInterferedByElements_ and _InterferesElements_.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE New inverse relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: HasProjections
DocAttribute.Documentation: Projection relationship that adds a feature (using a Boolean union) to the _IfcBuildingElement_.

DocAttribute.Name: HasOpenings
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the _IfcRelVoidsElement_ relationship that creates an opening in an element. An element can incorporate zero-to-many openings. For each opening, that voids the element, a new relationship _IfcRelVoidsElement_ is generated.

DocAttribute.Name: IsConnectionRealization
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the connection relationship with realizing element. The relationship, if provided, assigns this element as the realizing element to the connection, which provides the physical manifestation of the connection relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: ProvidesBoundaries
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to space boundaries by virtue of the objectified relationship _IfcRelSpaceBoundary_. It defines the concept of an element bounding spaces.

DocAttribute.Name: ConnectedFrom
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the element connection relationship. The relationship then refers to the other element that is connected to this element.

DocAttribute.Name: ContainedInStructure
DocAttribute.Documentation: Containment relationship to the spatial structure element, to which the element is primarily associated. This containment relationship has to be hierachical, i.e. an element may only be assigned directly to zero or one spatial structure.

DocAttribute.Name: HasCoverings
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to _IfcCovering_ by virtue of the objectified relationship _IfcRelCoversBldgElement_. It defines the concept of an element having coverings associated.

DocAttribute.Name: HasSurfaceFeatures
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the _IfcRelAdheresToElement_ relationship that adheres a _IfcSurfaceFeature_ to an element. An element can incorporate zero-to-many surface features in one relationship.
